Join us at the event to involve in the sessions for a deep dive into the report authoring, data preparation, and data modeling in Power BI Desktop.

Why Miracle?
Miracle Software Systems, Inc. is a Global Systems Integrator headquartered in Novi, MI - USA and has multiple Global Development Centers spanning across USA, Canada and India. As a Gold Partner of Microsoft, we offer a wide range of services in Business Intelligence (BI) and Analytics space. Today, Miracle's team includes 3000 IT Professionals, helping the clients with their data management and advanced analytics, both on the cloud and on-premise based solutions.
Miracle has a well-defined framework to embed world-class analytics in various apps to deliver Business Intelligence (BI) in real time, wherever decisions are made. Miracle's Enterprise Self-Service Analytics Framework on Microsoft Power BI defines an approach for enabling self-service analytics, multiple data models integrating data across various applications, and multiple reusable assets to get you started with your journey to self-service analytics.
